resources.string:
Home Page: https://opencoursehub.cs.sfu.ca/jackt/grav-cms/cmpt276-2/home
Pexels URL: https://www.pexels.com/photo/architectural-photography-of-brown-and-gray-castle-3061171/ 
Samples URL: https://canvas.sfu.ca/courses/56838/pages/sample-images
PNG Tree: https://pngtree.com/free-png-vectors/button
Fort Icon: https://icons8.com/icons/set/medieval

We, the English army have just defeated the significantly superior French army at Agincourt! The king now sends you to lead a small group of scouts in order to find the surrounding enemy forts in the area.

Tips:
-Click areas to reveal potential forts
-An area without a fort reveals the number of hidden forts in its row and column
-Pressing a revealed fort will give you information on other surrounding forts
